articles.author: Daniel Davis
articles.title: Villarreal pull off superb offside trap to catch out Bayern Munich in Unai Emery masterclass - Daily Mail
articles.description: Unai Emery was able to mastermind his side's 2-1 aggregate victory over the Bundesliga giants, with Samuel Chukwueze's goal in Bavaria sending the underdogs through.
articles.content:
Villarreal stunned Bayern Munich by knocking them out of the Champions League - and were also able to humiliate them in another small way by playing a streetwise offside trap.
Unai Emery masterminde… [+2006 chars]

articles.title: Roy Keane's prediction after Ole Gunnar Solskjaer sacking has come true at Manchester United - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester United produced another lifeless and forgettable display in Saturday's 1-0 defeat to Everton on Saturday.
articles.content:
Manchester United's Champions League qualification for next season took yet another blow on Saturday after being beaten 1-0 by Everton.
